wiki.summary: “Hawaii (Remix)” is a collaboration between the Colombian singer Maluma and Canadian singer The Weeknd. On November 3, 2020, the first rumor arose from the fact that the license in the YouTube description of the music video for the original song “Hawaii” recognized the song as a remix by Maluma and Abel. On November 4, 2020, both artists shared a photo of them together on their social media, hinting that there could be a possible remix of “Hawaii.” Read more on Last.fm.
wiki.content: “Hawaii (Remix)” is a collaboration between the Colombian singer Maluma and Canadian singer The Weeknd. On November 3, 2020, the first rumor arose from the fact that the license in the YouTube description of the music video for the original song “Hawaii” recognized the song as a remix by Maluma and Abel. On November 4, 2020, both artists shared a photo of them together on their social media, hinting that there could be a possible remix of “Hawaii.” Finally, Bull Nene, who is one of the composers of the song, confirmed the rumors of what would be the remix of the song through an Instagram story. Read more on Last.fm. User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License; additional terms may apply.
